episodes.title: Secretive Cult 'Counseling Session' Goes Horribly Wrong | The Word Of Life Cult
episodes.description:
Download Murder by Choice for FREE, support my channel, and get the gift of 500 energy!  https://nrdc.link/fzT5DF
By installing the game with this link or the QR code, you will receive additional 500 energy reward. The offer is valid until November 11, 2023.


The Word of Life Church was a tiny congregation, at its peak only boasting 40-50 members. When the original, power hungry minister of the church, Jerry Irwin, died, his even worse daughter, Tiffanie, took over. Years of brainwashing, control and abuse would cause some members to defect, but the few who remained would suffer a horrible fate. And in the end, a 19-year-old would lose his life in a brutal, heartbreaking way.

Sources:
https://people.com/crime/word-of-life-church-defendants-pastor-guilty-pleas/
https://people.com/crime/inside-the-world-life-church-is-it-a-cult/

episodes.title: The Doomsday Cult That Operated In Suburbia...And Still Exists Today
episodes.description:
Buy your own DNA kit here:  https://bit.ly/SOMMER_MH  Use the coupon code SOMMER for free shipping! As an added bonus, you can start a 30-day free trial of MyHeritage's best subscription for family history research - and enjoy a 50% discount if you decide to continue it.

In the 1970's, a man named Julius Schacknow started a doomsday cult called The Work. The group operated mostly out of suburban Connecticut and there was widespread abuse throughout the cult. Multiple deaths have been linked to Julius and The Work, with one in particular being confirmed to be a murder. Julius died in 1996, but The Work is still active today.

Sources:
https://www.investigationdiscovery.com/crimefeed/id-shows/sinful-messiah-the-work-cult-multiple-wives-exploitive-labor-murderhttps://people.com/crime/brother-julius-schacknow-the-work-connecticut-cult-people-magazine-investigates/
https://www.myrecordjournal.com/News/Lifestyle/Features/history-of-the-Brother-Julius-and-The-Work-cult-based-out-of-meriden.html#gallery-1
https://people.com/crime/self-proclaimed-sinful-messiah-sexually-abused-dozens-while-leading-polygamist-doomsday-cult/
https://nypost.com/2018/08/02/two-cult-members-busted-in-grisly-death-of-chief-apostle/
